title: Chris Harris & Edward Lovett
description:
It's the return of Chris Harris! And this time he's brought his Collecting Cars business / podcast partner, Ed Lovett. This was a good one. We talk about Chris' cars, the hypercar problem, Ferrari manuals, the 992 GT3, making content for the internet vs TV, the evolution of journalism, content creators, making money on YouTube, crashing things, Chump Car racing, getting stuck in the mountains, Cleetus, and more.
 

Recorded January 25, 2022

@harrismonkey

@edwardlovett

@collectingcars

https://collectingcars.com/

Follow us:

@thesmokingtire

@therealzackklapman

 

Want to find the right parts for you car? Head to http://carparts.com/thesmokingtire and get 10% off a purchase of $100 or more.

 

Find Valvoline now at your local auto parts store.

 

Go to blackvue.com/TST and use the promo code TIRE to get 10% off of any BlackVue dash cam. Free shipping for orders over $200.

 

Sign up at ButcherBox.com/TIRE and get 2 lbs of ground beef free in every order for the life of your membership.  

 

Patreon members got to watch the live stream, and our Pro Driver tier patrons have been able to watch or listen to this episode since the day we recorded it. Want your questions answered, to watch a live-stream, listen ad-free, or get early access? Join our Patreon. https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Chris harris, Ed Lovett)
